nodes.text: Yeprexi was a female pilot in the New Republic's Hound Squadron.  At one point, fellow Hound Squadron pilot Chass na Chadic stole Yeprexi's ship and crashed it into a bog, but Yeprexi never told any of their superiors about the incident. Yeprexi was an older woman, and Chadic described her as being able to dance like a demon and having a thousand superstitions. When the frigate Hellion's Dare was attacked by the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing in the Oridol Cluster, Yeprexi was killed.
